thread.title: Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms
thread.title_full: Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms

title: Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms
text: > Texas Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms FILE - In this April 2, 2015, file photo, Dallas Mavericks' Chandler Parsons gets up off the court after a hard fall during the second half of an NBA basketball game against the Houston Rockets in Dallas. Parsons had surgery shortly after the season on a right knee that kept him out of all but the opener in a five-game loss to Houston, his former team, in the first round of the playoffs. (AP Photo/Tony Gutierrez, File)
